Intel Might Actually Be Done With OpenGL 4.4 In Mesa

It was just last week that Intel crossed OpenGL 4.2 in Mesa and earlier today the needed Intel OpenGL 4.3 patches landed while tonight there are patches pending for the OpenGL 4.4 changes for Intel's open-source Linux graphics driver.

8 Hours Ago - Intel - OpenGL 4.4 Mesa - 16 Comments

NVIDIA vs. AMD OpenGL & Vulkan Benchmarks With Valve's Dota 2

Yesterday marked the public availability of Dota 2 with a Vulkan renderer after Valve had been showing it off for months. This is the second commercial Linux game (after The Talos Principle) to sport a Vulkan renderer and thus we were quite excited to see how this Dota 2 Vulkan DLC is performing for both NVIDIA GeForce and AMD Radeon graphics cards. Here are our initial Dota 2 benchmarks with Vulkan as well as OpenGL for reference when using the latest Linux graphics drivers on Ubuntu.

24 May 03:58 PM EDT - Linux Gaming - 35 Comments

AMDGPU-PRO Beta 2 vs. Mesa 11.3 + Linux 4.6: Very Competitive For Linux Gamers

Following last week's AMDGPU-PRO 16.20.3 "Beta 2" driver release of AMD's new hybrid driver stack for Linux that makes use of the AMDGPU open-source kernel DRM driver with the closed-source OpenGL driver derived from Catalyst / Radeon Software, I set out to do a fresh open vs. closed-source driver comparison. For the Radeon R9 285, R9 290, and R9 Fury, I compared the performance of this new AMDGPU-PRO driver against Mesa 11.3-devel Git and Linux 4.6 for the latest open-source driver stack.

24 May 12:20 PM EDT - Display Drivers - 31 Comments
Intel's P-State Driver Does Seem To Be In Bad Shape On Linux 4.6~4.7

A few days ago when delivering benchmarks of the new CPUFreq "Schedutil" governor in Linux 4.7 the P-State comparison results on this Git kernel looked particularly terrible. I've since done some P-State tests on the same system using the Linux 4.5 and 4.6 kernels that further point towards a regression having taken place.

24 May 11:35 AM EDT - Intel - P-State Woes - 8 Comments

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--16px js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="zh" data-aria-label-part="0">我想「欺詐成份」令「輿論」不會重點落墨在「言論審查」份上。而作品的「真意」在張德江訪港時不能曝光；之後才娓娓道來，未免賊過興兵。而且作品本身就有點曲高和寡，很難入口，販夫走卒如我，聽過解釋後只能空氣凝住十秒鐘，然後再禮貌地乾笑兩聲。 <a href="/WLYeung" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="48289117" ><s>@</s><b>WLYeung</b></a> <a href="/beidaijin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="435954378" ><s>@</s><b>beidaijin</b></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--26px js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="zh" data-aria-label-part="4">当年的战地记者Morley Safer生前的一句话或许代表了不只他一个人的想法：“集权政府越早消失，越好，对所有各方来讲都是。”<a href="https://t.co/6VjLjhibI7" rel="nofollow" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/iyouport_news/status/735046138571587584" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/iyouport_news/status/735046138571587584" ><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/iyouport_news/</span><span class="invisible">status/735046138571587584</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"> </span>…</span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Idinagdag ni 贝带劲,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet
    
    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/iyouport_news/status/735046138571587584" aria-hidden="true"

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container"
      data-item-id="735046138571587584"

      data-screen-name="iyouport_news"

      tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <span class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">iyouport</b>
    <span class="QuoteTweet-screenname u-dir" dir="ltr">
      <span class="at">@</span>iyouport_news
    </span>
  </span>

          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir js-ellipsis"
            lang="zh"
            data-aria-label-part="2"
            
            dir="ltr">刚刚过世的哥伦比亚广播公司记者Safer曾做美越战争的战地记者，他说过：当年越共之所以成功，是因为他们成功地利用了越南人内心深处那种抵制任何外来势力的心理—每个人都把越南民族主义放在第一位，这种情结在他们心目中比任何‘主义’都重要。<a  rel="nofollow" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://iyouport.com/news/%E5%89%8D%E3%80%9060%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E3%80%91%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%EF%BC%9A%E6%B0%91%E6%97%8F%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E6%83%85%E7%BB%93%E5%9C%A8%E8%B6%8A%E5%8D%97%E9%87%8D%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://iyouport.com/news/%E5%89%8D%E3%80%9060%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E3%80%91%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%EF%BC%9A%E6%B0%91%E6%97%8F%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E6%83%85%E7%BB%93%E5%9C%A8%E8%B6%8A%E5%8D%97%E9%87%8D%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89" ><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">iyouport.com/news/%E5%89%8D</span><span class="invisible">%E3%80%9060%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E3%80%91%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%EF%BC%9A%E6%B0%91%E6%97%8F%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E6%83%85%E7%BB%93%E5%9C%A8%E8%B6%8A%E5%8D%97%E9%87%8D%E4%BA%8E%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"> </span>…</span></a></div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--16px js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="zh" data-aria-label-part="0">艺术家揭示了在香港最高建筑的外立面展示的一件巨大艺术品中嵌入的隐晦政治信息仅仅几天之后，官员和展览组织者取消了这件作品。她们周日晚间在声明中说，艺术家们对主办方表现了“不尊重”……

WordPress缓存类WP_Object_Cache将数据缓存在内存中，每次请求，都会重新生成缓存。如果服务器支持内存缓存，如memcache 将会提高效率（相同页面处的多次查询数据）。减少数据库的请求次数。流量不大的用处也就不是很明显。 总的来说，没啥用。留作零碎记录 相关函数： wp_cache_add($key, $data, $flag = '', $expire = 0);//添加缓存 wp_cache_get($key, $flag = '');//得到缓存，没有则返回false //$key 自定义缓存名称 //$data 缓存数据 //$e......

  /* hover state for found media items */

  .photo-selector:hover .btn,

    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#00FFFFFF', endColorstr='#19088253'); /* IE8-9 */

  .icon-btn.disabled,
  .icon-btn.disabled:hover,
  .icon-btn[disabled],
  .icon-btn[aria-disabled=true] {
    color: #088253;
  }

  /* tweet-btn can have primary-btn class as well so the following rules ensure that the correct background color is applied */
  .tweet-btn,
  .tweet-btn:focus {
    background-color: #088253;
    background: rgba(8,130,83,.8);
  }

  .tweet-btn:hover,
  .tweet-btn:active,

  .btn:focus,
  .btn.focus,
  .Button:focus {
    box-shadow:
      0 0 0 1px #fff,
      0 0 0 3px rgba(8, 130, 83, 0.5);
  }

  .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(8, 130, 83, 0.5);
  }

  /* highlighting when navigate through timeline stream table view with j & k. */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item[tabindex="-1"]:focus {
    outline: 3px solid rgba(8, 130, 83, 0.5) !important;
  }

  /* box-shadow does not work with table tr element */
  .js-navigable-stream.stream-table-view .selected-stream-item:focus {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  /**
   * 1. Bring actionable tweet to top when active to ensure border
   *    highlighting wraps entire tweet. Value must be at least at if not
   *    higher than the z-index value of ProfileHeading to ensure first
   *    tweet in timeline receives border on all four sides.
   *    NOTE: z-index should be 2 to avoid conflicts with .ProfileCanopy and .ProfileCard-avatarLink
   */

  .js-stream-item.is-selected:focus .ProfileCard,
  .QuoteTweet:hover,
  .QuoteTweet:focus,
  .QuoteTweet:active,
  .activity-user-profile-content:hover,
  .activity-user-profile-content:focus,
  .activity-user-profile-content:active {

<div class="list-editor">

    <span class="help-text">Under 100 characters, optional</span>

  <fieldset class="field">
    <legend class="t1-legend">Privacy</legend>
    <div class="options">
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-public-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-public-radio" value="public" checked="checked"  />

      </label>
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-private-radio">
        <input class="radio" type="radio" name="mode" id="list-private-radio" value="private"  />
        <b>Private</b> · Only you can access this list
      </label>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
  <hr/>

  <div class="list-editor-save">
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary update-list-button" data-list-id="">Save list</button>

      </div>
